trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Define os atributos relacionados ao tamanho de uma imagem de bitmap em cache.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: Um bitmap é dimensionado com base nos valores que são definidos por esta classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> com propriedades de dimensionamento vazio.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>definido como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>definido como zero e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>definido como zero.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: Quando passados para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, a entrada é o mesmo que a saída.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> que preserva a taxa de proporção do bitmap de origem e especifica um inicial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>definido como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>definido como o valor de `pixelHeight`e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>definido como zero.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando pixelHeight é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> que preserva a taxa de proporção do bitmap de origem e especifica um inicial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"> </xref> para aplicar.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap resultante mantém sua taxa de proporção original e o dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>propriedade definida como o valor de `rotation`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>definida como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>definido como 0 e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>definido como 0.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: O valor inicial de rotação para aplicar.

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: Há suporte para apenas incrementos de 90 graus.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> que preserva a taxa de proporção do bitmap de origem e especifica um inicial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>definido como `true`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>definido como zero e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>definido como o valor de `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelWidth is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando pixelWidth é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref> que não preserva a taxa de proporção original do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap resultante tem um tamanho eficaz de `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>terá seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>definido como `false`, sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>definido como o valor de `pixelHeight`e seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>definido como o valor de `pixelWidth`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, do bitmap resultante.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância da <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando pixelHeight é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: A altura, em pixels, da imagem de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: PixelHeight must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelHeight deve ser maior que zero para ser válido.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A altura do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, da imagem de bitmap.

trans-unit.source: PixelWidth must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelWidth deve ser maior que zero para ser válido.

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A largura do bitmap.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que determina se a taxa de proporção da imagem de bitmap original é preservada.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Se a taxa de proporção original é preservada, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>representam os valores de tamanho máximo para o bitmap.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: O bitmap resultante é garantido apenas para ter sua largura ou sua altura correspondem aos valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: Se a taxa de proporção não é preservada, especificado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>forem usadas e o bitmap é esticado para usar esses valores.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a taxa de proporção original é mantida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o ângulo de rotação é aplicado a um bitmap.

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: Há suporte para apenas os incrementos de 90 graus.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: O ângulo de rotação que é aplicado à imagem.
